tool.name: odgi overlap
tool.description: find paths overlapped by query paths
tool.command: odgi overlap --input '$input' #if str($subset_paths) --subset-paths '$subset_paths' #end if #if str($path) --path '$path' #end if #if str($paths) --paths '$paths' #end if #if str($bed_input) --bed-input '$bed_input' #end if @THREADS@ > '$output'

param.label: Subset of paths considered
param.help: Text file with one path per line.

tool.help:
@HELP_HEADER@
`odgi overlap` lists paths touched by the queried paths or intervals.
### Inputs
- **Input odgi graph**: Graph to query. - **Subset/path/path lists**: Limit overlap detection to selected paths. - **BED intervals**: Query path ranges.
### Outputs
- **Tabular**: Overlap results in tab-delimited format.
